name: I.Q Intelligent Qube
summary:
I.Q Intelligent Qube is a test of intelligence created by a higher power than ourselves. Your objective: destroy huge, deadly cubes as they roll relentlessly towards you and clear a path through the onslaught simply to survive.

Experience I.Q Intelligent Qube originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.
